patthana17.26:1.1_0: Pītisahagataṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca napītisahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana17.26:2.1_0: Sukhasahagataṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana17.26:3.1_0: Upekkhāsahagataṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana17.26:4.1_0: Hetuyā ekavīsati, adhipatiyā ekavīsati …pe… avigate ekavīsati. (Vedanāttikasadisaṁ. Saṅkhittaṁ.)
